title: INDEX MATCH
summary: Combine INDEX and MATCH for powerful, flexible lookups. This technique overcomes VLOOKUP's limitations and is preferred by Excel experts.

title: VLOOKUP Function
summary: Look up values in a table by searching the first column and returning a value from another column. VLOOKUP is one of Excel's most popular functions.

title: XLOOKUP Function
summary: The modern replacement for VLOOKUP with more flexibility and easier syntax. XLOOKUP can search in any direction and returns exact matches by default.

title: Navigation Shortcuts
summary: Essential keyboard shortcuts for moving around spreadsheets quickly. Master these to dramatically speed up your Excel workflow.

title: Pivot Tables
summary: Summarize and analyze large datasets with pivot tables. Learn how to create, customize, and use pivot tables effectively.

title: Formatting Shortcuts
summary: Keyboard shortcuts for formatting cells, text, and numbers in Excel. Apply bold, italic, borders, and number formats instantly.

title: SUMIF Function
summary: Sum values based on a single condition or criteria. SUMIF is essential for conditional calculations in Excel.
